title.value: ESTRO 2023 - DailyPlan and ClinAdapt ART strategies
title.justification: The paper discusses strategies like DailyPlan and ClinAdapt for ESTRO 2023.
title.quote: DailyPlan consisted of daily online replanning with 1mm setup robustness setting (SRS) and 3% range robustness setting (RRS). ClinAdapt consisted of an initial treatment plan generated for the planning CT (pCT) using 3 mm/3% SRS/RRS, and ad-hoc replanning based on clinical evaluation.

extractions.description: The paper evaluates different adaptive radiation therapy (ART) strategies, mainly focusing on DailyPlan and ClinAdapt, comparing their effectiveness in terms of target coverage and NTCP reductions.

type.justification: The paper provides simulation results and comparisons of ART strategies' effectiveness, indicating an empirical study.
type.quote: For evaluation, 25 fractionated treatment courses were simulated for each patient for all 5 strategies, using known setup and range error distributions.

name.justification: The paper focuses on adaptive radiation therapy strategies, which is a subfield of Radiation Therapy.
name.quote: The investigated ART alternatives were: 1) wOffR: weekly offline replanning... Compared to DailyPlan.

name.justification: The paper explores various adaptive techniques for radiation therapy, specifically DailyPlan and ClinAdapt.
name.quote: DailyPlan consisted of daily online replanning... ClinAdapt consisted of an initial treatment plan...

name.justification: The DailyPlan is explicitly mentioned as a strategy explored in the study for ART.
name.quote: DailyPlan consisted of daily online replanning with 1mm setup robustness setting (SRS) and 3% range robustness setting (RRS).

is_executed.justification: The paper discusses the execution and results of using DailyPlan, indicating it was executed.
is_executed.quote: In DailyPlan, 15/15 patients had a near minimum CTV V95% above the requested 98% for both CTVs.

is_compared.justification: DailyPlan's effectiveness is compared with other strategies like ClinAdapt in terms of NTCP reductions.
is_compared.quote: NTCP differences from DailyPlan are presented in Fig.2...
